id.description: The Tillhub scan prefix resource reference ID.

prefix.description: The prefix to look up and remove from scan results before requesting the voucher.

oneOf.description: The display string for presenting the selection of available prefixes.
'X' will be filled with digits/characters from a scan result.
The minimum length before a lookup can be performed.

id.description: The Tillhub system resource reference ID associated with this prefix.

oneOf.description: The Tillhub sub-system resource reference ID associated with this prefix.
The Tillhub product resource reference ID assocuated with this prefix.

id.description: The Tillhub voucher action resource reference ID.

oneOf.description: Additional parameter for external voucher systems, e.g. Fleurop Voucher Type specifier
Specifies from where this action can be triggered
Specifies the key for a request by e.g. 'code'

id.description: The Tillhub system resource reference ID associated with this prefix.

system.description: The Tillhub sub-system resource reference ID associated with this prefix.

oneOf.description: The Tillhub product resource reference ID assocuated with this prefix.
defines the value prefilling of the bank expense at the time of a balance
defines wether image is mandatory, optional, for expenses
defines wether image is mandatory, optional, or non-mandatory for deposits
defines wether image is mandatory, optional, or non-mandatory for banks
defines wether image is mandatory, optional, or non-mandatory for safes
defines wether image is mandatory, optional, or non-mandatory for tips
defines visibility of accounts per context e.g. balance

manual_trigger.description: defines whether manual trigger for cashing ups is possible or not

on_cashier_change.description: defines whether a counting is mandatory to switch cashier

receipt_counting.description: defines whether a receipt is printed on cashing ups or not

warning.description: defines whether warning is displayed in case of discrepancy

enabled.description: Defines if automatically triggered countout is enabled or not

transactions.description: If automatic countout is enabled, defines the numer of transactions that will trigger a new count out

minutes.description: If automatic countout is enabled, defines the minutes interval that will trigger a new count out

enabled.description: defines whether time tracking feature is active or not

oneOf.description: Specifies if advertisement opt-out is enabled.
Specifies if hiding of cart sum is enabled.
Specifies if vouchers can be printed again from e.g. the history details.
Specifies if a receipt is printed when transaction is canceled after cart view.
defines wether balance reconciliation with terminal is mandatory
defines which conditions must be fulfilled prior to a new sale
In case of refund items - specifies if quantity and price can be edited

language.description: Specifies the preferable language code based on IETF language tag: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IETF_language_tag

invoice_generation.description: waiting period for transaction to be sync, passed this parameter the invoice will be generated offline SECONDS

oneOf.description: defines behaviour of cash drawer

finish_payment.description: defines when the drawer is opened on finished payment

transaction_signing.description: If Printer TSE signing is active and all other conditions are met - define the opening in relation to the signing process

oneOf.description: defines epson tse state updates (local retrieval plus upload)

transactions.description: If more transactions have been done since the last update - a new update will be tried

minutes.description: If more minutes have passed since the last update - a new update will be tried

oneOf.description: defines epson self test conditions

info_minutes.description: If more minutes have passed since the last update - a new storage info will be requested from the hardware

threshold_minutes.description: If fewer minutes are left before a mandotory test - a self test will be performed on the hardware

oneOf.description: Settings for inactivity monitor.
Allowed idle time in seconds before locking the application

scheme.description: URL-scheme to use for this link

itunes.description: App Store ID to use if 3rd-party-app is not installed

icon.description: Name of the icon file used on the client

schedule_time_minutes.description: Time in minutes before scheduled objects will be set to pending state (tried for resynch)

limit.description: Initial page size for syncing with GET all calls. In-app default is 500. Set this if you run into timeouts.
Initial page size for syncing with GET all calls. In-app default is 500. Set this if you run into timeouts.
Initial page size for syncing with GET all calls. In-app default is 500. Set this if you run into timeouts.
Initial page size for syncing with GET all calls. In-app default is 500. Set this if you run into timeouts.

parameters.description: Defines the usage of parameters for up- and downstream.

branch.description: Defines usage of the branch parameter.

upstream.description: Defines if branch parameter is used in updatream.

downstream.description: Defines if branch parameter is used in downstream.

limit.description: Initial page size for syncing with GET all calls. In-app default is 500. Set this if you run into timeouts.
Initial page size for syncing with GET all calls. In-app default is 500. Set this if you run into memory issues.
Initial page size for syncing with GET all calls. In-app default is 500. Set this if you run into timeouts.

register.description: Defines the settings on register opening and closing

oneOf.description: Defines if counting protocol is active or not on register opening
Defines if counting protocol is active or not on register closing

limit.description: Limits product search results to a maximum of N

only_self_sustained.description: Instruct clients to filter for types 'variant_product', 'product' and 'voucher'

limit.description: Limits customers search results to a maximum of N
Limits staffs search results to a maximum of N
Limits vouchers search results to a maximum of N
Limits transactions search results to a maximum of N

dashboard.description: Dashboard settings (overrides client defaults, client defaults are set differently also for white label apps).

url.description: URL of this account's perferred help center

support.description: Decides whether or not the support team is allowed to access the account this configuration belongs to.

tax.description: Tax account this butten will select when available on a per-item base and if default == FALSE.

default.description: If TRUE the default behavior of the checkout button (without additional logic) will be used.

oneOf.description: When local data ís missing - counting numbers can be initialized from the corresponding API table or - if available - from a secondary local storage (e.g. keychain on iOS)

voucher_systems_source.description: Defines how the voucher systems table on the client will be filled, either from configurations or from the voucher_systems table

franchise_id.description: The custom franchise ID that e.g. will be used during customer number generation

id.description: DEPRECATED: the legacy format for franchise ID

cashier_pin_cancel_enabled.description: If true, a cashier is allowed to cancel a PIN request. If false, the PIN request is not cancelable and will stay there

cashier_pin_logout_enabled.description: If true, a cashier is allowed to logout on a mandatory PIN request.

salesman_pin_policy.description: The salesperson selection screen will be presented automatically before or after a sale (or not in case of none).

cashier_pin_policy.description: If required, the client shows a non-discardable login view (staff selection + login).

show_staff_number.description: If true, staff number will be shown below the name in the staff selection view.

promote_permissions.description: If true, the client performs a migration from legacy permissions once.

staff_number_length.description: If the API defines a specific length for a staff number it can be reported here.

oneOf.description: Defines whether selecting a predefined reason is required when booking an expense
Defines whether selecting a predefined reason is required when booking a deposit
Defines if a note is mandatory on price changes on the register
Defines configurations for price change reason
Defines whether asking for a reason for a price change is enabled on the register
Defines if a reason is mandatory on price changes on the register
Defines if a note is mandatory for sale cancellation

safe_deposit_limit.description: How much cash per currency can be taken from a safe, regardless of it's state

oneOf.description: A list of non-negative monetary values by currency

items.description: Describes a non-negative monetary value in a specific currency.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

safe_expense_limit.description: How much cash per currency can be put into a safe, regardless of it's state

oneOf.description: A list of non-negative monetary values by currency

items.description: Describes a non-negative monetary value in a specific currency.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

keep_change_suggestion.description: Will suggest balance expenses so that this amount is kept as change in the register, will not block overriding

oneOf.description: A list of non-negative monetary values by currency

items.description: Describes a non-negative monetary value in a specific currency.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

low_cash_threshold.description: Will pop a warning when register cash runs low

oneOf.description: A list of non-negative monetary values by currency

items.description: Describes a non-negative monetary value in a specific currency.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

oneOf.description: Specifies on which level the precise VAT calculation is performed (before rounding)
Defines the fractional rounding behavior of currencies (e.g. to 0.05 CHF)

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

enabled.description: States if rounding information should be used for this currency

oneOf.description: The smallest fraction to round to when source equals 'fixed'.

source.description: The source for defining the fraction

oneOf.description: Used to be "settings_old.fa_transit_account"

enabled.description: Specifies if library view is available.
Specifies if scan view is available.

oneOf.description: Restaurant case: pagers/coasters/buzzers

enabled.description: Specifies if the feature is available.

oneOf.description: Largest pager number - serves as a helper to contrain the input component.
If true and not previously assigned - show a prompt that asks the cashier to add a pager number on cart checkout
Payback.de behavior configuration

prompt.description: If true - show a prompt that asks the customer for a payback number

number_format.description: The format of the customer payback number that is being validated against the input

number_length_max.description: The maxiumum length of a customer payback number (as a helper for the UI)

oneOf.description: Restaurant case: split bill between a group of guests

enabled.description: Specifies if the feature is available.
Specifies if gastro tables feature is available - mutually exclusive with 'web_view'.

oneOf.description: Web view with js-interaction to iOS. Introduced by Regiondo project. Can not be used with Gastro.

enabled.description: Specifies if a web view is shown in the main sale view - mutually exclusive with 'gastro_tables'.

url.description: The URL of the web view

name.description: Display name of the web view tab in the POS

log_level.description: defines the granularity of the web api logging.

oneOf.description: defines behavior for manually assigning external references to a cart

enabled.description: Specifies if - for given conditions - an external reference can be assigned manually to a cart (e.g. via the cart menu).

request_on_checkout.description: Specifies if - for given conditions - an external reference will be requested on checkout (skippable).

oneOf.description: Custom override of the question text before adding this reference manually.
oneOf.example: There seems to be no order number set. Do you want to add it manually?

number_format.description: The format of the reference number that is being validated against the input

number_length_max.description: The maxiumum length of the reference number (as a helper for the UI)

use_fallback.description: Legacy tax options can be used as a fallback before all products are synched

enabled.description: defines whether preview printing is enabled.
defines whether remote access is available on the main POS.

background_release_seconds.description: The time in seconds that the Local Server will stay available when the app is send to the background.

log_level.description: defines the granularity of the local server logging.

oneOf.description: defines whether orders are locked to the waiters
defines whether the pin from the next waiter will be required in the reassignment.

minimum_check_enabled.description: Enable email notifications on the client accounts email address, when a product's stock sinks below the defined stock minimum.

oneOf.description: Stock configurations for POS clients
Sale stock restrictions
Defines behavior if products with negative stock can be sold.
Restrictions on actively booking stock from th POS
Defines if reasons are mandatory for increasing stock
Defines if reasons are mandatory for lowering stock
Defines specific bahviors for barcode usage and generation, e.g. for BSH
Defines how the transaction barcode field will be set - this will get printed at the bottom of a receipt.
Allows refunding transactions from different registers in the same branch
Allows refunding transactions from different branches
Defines if reasons are mandatory for refunding items from a previous transaction
Decides if and how transactions will be fiscally signed and where the specific configuration can be found

type.description: The fiscal signing type to use, e.g. Fiskaltrust in Austria or EposnTSE in Germany

resource_type.description: Decides where the specific device configuration will be looked up

oneOf.description: Transactions created before (Now() - Range) are not guaranteed to be kept on the client (e.g. older ones will be deleted).

value.description: The value of the range, defines a timeframe together with the set unit.

oneOf.description: Maximum number of transactions that are kept on the client.

strict_mode.description: If true and the template contains product group - product group ID will be a required property for product ID generation.

oneOf.description: Defines which price is chosen by default when conflict
Defines how variant-children inherit pricebook entries from their parents

product_id_template.description: A Tillhub string pattern that allows for parameterized product id generation

generate_product_id.description: The toggle to opt-in or -out of the product number generation. Send this as query parameter on creation: ?generate_product_id=true

attributes_in_name.description: Defines whether a child product inherits attributes as part of the product name

auto_product_number_enabled.description: If true, product id will be generated automatically

auto_product_group_number_enabled.description: If true, product group number will be generated automatically

oneOf.description:
Search string extraction rules.

Defines how a search string can be extracted from a scanned barcode (that might contain additional, non-search-related data).

Seroal number extraction rules.

Defines how a serial number will potentially be extracted from a scanned barcode.

show_product_number.description: Shows the product number on the UI

show_product_group_number.description: Shows the product group number on the UI

allow_zero_prices.description:
If true, a product can be added to the cart with 0.0 as price or its price can be changed to 0.0.

NOTE: Hard validation will be removed entirely!
Behavior will be driven by 'v1/products.configuration.pricing.request_input'
and 'v1/products.configuration.pricing.zero_input_allowed'.

show_empty_options.description: If true, children with availability 0 will be shown in the option selection process

customer_number_template.description: A Tillhub string pattern that allows for parameterized customer number generation

generate_customer_number.description: The toggle to opt-in or -out of the customer number generation. Send this as query parameter on creation: ?generate_customer_number=true

customer_add_policy.description: The customer selection screen will be presented automatically before or after a sale (or not in case of none).

enabled.description: Specifies if saved carts are available.

confirm_deletion.description: Specifies if the deletion of saved carts must be confirmed.

sync.description: Describes the synching behavior of saved carts.

auto.description: Specifies if saved carts should be synched automatically.

interval.description: If auto is enabled - saved carts will be synched automatically every interval SECONDS.

enabled.description: Specifies if delivery notes are available.
States if digital receipts should be used
States if order receipts should be used

items.description: Legacy tags (metadata plain text) from cart item products that will cause assignment to this specific receipt.
The tag resource ids which will be tested for intersection with the cart item's product tag ids

title.description: Visual clue where a specific receipt should be used.

coaster.description: If true - print the coaster(number) on the specified receipt

pager.description: If true - print the pager(number) on the specified receipt

oneOf.description: If true - print the complete set of items after a sale (filtered by tags)
How to print items (filtered by tags) after intermediate changes to the order
Defines the signing-types that trigger printing of a not-yet-certified clause

... if the transaction is supposed to be fiskally signed.
If a pager number is assigned - states if a pager receipt will be printed on the main printer
States if the main merchant receipt will be printed
States if the terminal merchant receipt will be printed
States which conditions will trigger automatic printing of the merchant receipt
... if the transaction contains payments from a terminal

... if tips were given
... if the transaction contains refunded items

clear_confirmation.description: Specifies if clearing the cart must be confirmed.

receipts.description: defines flags that control the client's email API requests

Timeout (in seconds) for hiding UI components (activity indicator)

externals.description: This defines whether a client account should be able to consume external analytics data, e.g. of other Tillhub client accounts.

external_targets.description: This defines to which external systems analytics data should be made available, e.g. other Tillhub client accounts. Those external systems need to be authorised additionally via a user, with sufficient scopes. In the Tillhub client account to Tillhub client account scenerio the target account must have a matching 'external' entry as it is defined above.

aggregate_tips.description: A flag to determine whether to include tips in analytics reports

aggregate_vouchers.description: A flag to determine whether to include vouchers in analytics reports

background_release_seconds.description: The time in seconds that the scanner will stay connected when the app is send to the background (for other apps to grab afterwards)
The time in seconds that the scanner will stay connected when the app is send to the background (for other apps to grab afterwards)

items.description: Views or conditions where a printer connection is tried just in case

hooks.description: Define were to hook this dashbaord in. In any cases it will be available in the dashboard /utilities/custom_dashboards

oneOf.description: If true, skips the x-report and directly goes to conduct a balance.
If true - print the balance automatically after closing the register.
If true, balances are not conductable without fiat/cash cashflows.
Defines behavior if there are open orders when conducting a balance.
Defines if and how balances require direct uploading.
If true, balances need to be uploaded directly (best effort with retries).
If strict submission is enabled - the number of retries before handing over to the sync-manager
If true, shows a warning for pending transactions on the balance view
If true, warns the user when cash counted is not equal to cash calculated.
If true, adds extended balance information to the UI.
If true - show the expenses grouped by their financial accounts, otherwise only the total.
If true and extended_report = true - prints extended balance information on the receipt.
If true and extended_report = true - excludes vouchers from the calculation (switches to a different set of properties).
data to be displayed and printed if extended_report = true

average_amount_gross_per_cart.description: Total amount tx gross / (number of sales- sales cancelled)

average_cart_items_count_per_cart.description: Average number of cart items per sale, total count of product sold / count of transaction

first_last_expense_deposit.description: first and last expense and deposit

vat_details.description: Display the Total, gross, net per VAT account

discount_amount.description: Sum of discounts amounts - Cancelled discounts

total_quantity.description: All quantities in transactions summed up → This figure might not be representative in the case of decimal products (Example: 900 gr)

voucher_amount.description: sum of the amounts of vouchers sold (positive values only)

tips_expense.description: Defines if a tip expense is required within conducting the balance (if tips > 0).

bank_expense.description: Defines if a bank expense is required within conducting the balance (if register cash > 0).

show_account_names.description: Defines if account names are shown additionally to the numbers.

search_view.description: Scan view, should be limited to products/offlineFirst

trigger_action.description: Trigger a context specific action (e.g. addToCart, refundSale) on a result condition

no_result_action.description: Trigger a specific behavior if the search ended without results

no_result_sound.description: If true - triggers a specific sound if the search ended without results

timeout.description: Timeout (in seconds) to end a search if there are no results

search_entities.description: Entities that should be searched in a specific context. Searches will be performed in parallel (within an entity per defined behavior).

type.description: Searchable entities within the iOS client app

behavior.description: Search behavior within a single entity, limited by availability (e.g. vouchers: only online_first)
